title: T drives 45 kms towards East, turns right and drives 65 kms, then turns left and drives 33 kms. In which direction is she facing now? - Quora

response.answer_text: (Refer to the pic given below the answer ).Let's say that the girl T started her journey from point O. When she is moving along the path OA her face is towards east .At point A , she takes a right turn and move along the path AB .While she is moving along path AB ,her face is towards south . At point B , she takes a left turn and starts moving along the path BC .So ,she is facing towards east . 🌹🌹She is facing east 🌹🌹
